CustomField.description: Field to separate post trial pipeline bookings in order to calculate pipeline coverage
CustomField.formula: IF( OR( ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Trial"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Proposal"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Decision"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Purchase"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closing"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Orders Processing"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Ready to Ship") ), ACV_Bookings_SOT__c , 0)
CustomField.label: Post Trial Pipeline contribution
